original: ** Welcome to the mystical island of Kraznov Poopata **
** Its existence is far away from time or matter - it exists out of pure belief **
** The horror of absolute reason of no doubt might be released soon! Beware! **
** A wall of stubbornness will open soon and will the journey begin... **
** Descend back to purity to play the games that had once freed you **
** and meet again the wippity part of yourselves... **
** TIP: I think that means you have to play some puzzle or game now... **
** There is an orange cube thing and a sorta basket thing... Might it be basketball? **
** MOVE! Clear the path to the one who will set you and I free **
** Or else, face the consequences of the cubic ball! **
** TIP: You should get off the ramp if you do not want to die **
** YOU'RE GETTING POOPFARTED FOR BEING 2LOW WACKOS **
** ERRBODY GETTIN' DEDED - GO H8 THE MAP MOAR! **
** Perhaps you are in need of some morale encouragements... **
** Here, an extra pressure never does anything bad at all **
** TIP: The map does not tolerate missed shots **
** This puzzle really puzzles your head in a puzzling manner **
** But in the end, the end is inevitable as my patience nears its end... **
** TIP: I am serious. Hit. Those. Shots. Now. **
** THIS IS THE END! MEET YOUR MAKER, LITERALLY **
** But that would be too easy... **
** You might be exhausted from all that physical exercise - take the elevator! **
** Staying in the middle is the best way to ensure you will go up... **
** May you rest again or try hard for a futile bounty... **
** TIP: Holding without going into the seizure-inducing bridge is good - if you don't want a present. **
** Go ahead! Your path is full of endless possibilities! **
** Down you go - perhaps it is sadness knocking? **
** It's a simple elevator... **
** Thanks for the tip!!!!!!!!!!!!!!11!!1!1!one **
** Among the stars a cavern of endless night in blue and black awaits... **
** The cavern is godawful and ugly - as it is a metaphor for your face **
** TIP: That shit is retarded. Hold a bit and the purple wall will open. **
** Another uppity down thingo wacko thong... The mapper obviously doesn't know what to do! **
** At times the tree of life branches and the green lively leaves have to say goodbye... **
** TIP: I think that's actually a bit straightforward... UR ALL MORANS!!! **
** That was not nice. At all. **
** TIP: Sigh... OK - Split up and press both buttons (red blocks) at the same time (YAY INNOVATIVE!!!) **
** Cooperation for once brought success to the situation **
** Who would have said... Heh? **
** Most of the time patience is virtue - the rest of it it's just boring **
** Yeah right... Let's hold right here again because we need to make this awful map even longer. **
** MAD FUCKING MAPPING SKILLS. I. TELL. YOU. **
** A leap of faith is usually needed to get your endeavours to a good end **
** Great! Now we all might die if the map is just a troll map. REAL FUCKING FUN. **
** And now for once meet the universally known bridges of stupidity! **
** The only fierce bridges in the mystical world of belief that enforce backpedalling! **
** Remember! Those bridges are named as such because only stupids backpedal! **
** TIP: Walking forward is sketchy. You will have to walk backwards for ease. **
** Use your mouse to look backwards to go forward. **
** This door right here opens faster if you give it some sweet loving - I swear! **
** TIP: The map would never lie. EVER. Go hug the door. **
** Most of the time you are waiting for things that aren't worth it **
** OK! Get going a bit - You'll need to hold that shapeless attempt of a thing right there! **
** You're kinda starting to get my feelings hurt and it's not nice... **
** They're obviously bridged nipples! Don't you see? **
** Why are you even bothering with this map? It's just helpless... **
** There's good news and bad news! **
** The good news is that the end of the map is close - thank the Holy Molly goo! **
** The bad ones... well... There's this absurd puzzle thing here I don't even understand. **
